item.title: Python ü§ù R
item.description: Have you ever had the desire to use Python in R? Oh, well let's imagine that you did. All you have to do is install this fancy little package called 'Reticulate'. Let me give you a small taste of the possibilities. library(reticulate) Now that we have Reticulate installed, R can understand code written in Python. Kinda like learning French in half a second. Let's see how these two languages acn work together.
